summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2498, for the improvement of Brandon Street, Lucile Street and Findlay Street, each from 42nd Avenue South to 46th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 27763 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
